title: Been banned, If i make a new account will Riot be mad?

replies.body:
In most cases, you're fine to make a new account and play again. If your ban was related to in-game behavior, just keep in mind that similar behavior could end up in another suspension.

If you have any other questions, let me know.
no they wont. if you improve after the shock of loosing the account they welcome you back if you didnt change it wont take too long to loose tha ccount again
Took like 10 years to lose my account.
